summary: We can thank speculation around the launch of a spot bitcoin exchange-traded fund for an increase in market fluctuations and increased volatility.
title: Spot crypto trading volumes surge to levels not seen since March
content: The recent crypto rally that propelled Bitcoin toward $35,000 is revitalizing the previously calm market, as daily exchange volumes reach their highest levels since spring.

According to The Block's data dashboard, the seven-day moving average for spot exchange volumes across the market's reputable platforms breached $24 billion on October 26. This level hasn't been reached since the end of March.

<iframe frameborder="0" height="420" src="https://www.theblock.co/data/crypto-markets/spot/total-exchange-volume-daily/embed" title="Daily Exchange Volume (7DMA)" width="100%" data-v-f87c67ca=""></iframe>

The market has experienced more pronounced fluctuations compared to the summer as traders process headlines about the potential launch of a spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund, which proponents believe will create new channels for capital influx. That's lifted volatility to level not seen since April, The Block's dashboard shows.
